item.title: RickLab Now Is Open
item.description: Welcome, Rick Labs is open to every interesting idea. â€œThe law of gravity and gravity itself did not exist before Isaac Newton." …and what that means is that that law of gravity exists nowhere except in people’s heads! It ’s a ghost!" Mind has no matter or energy but they can’t escape its predominance over everything they do. Logic exists in the mind. numbers exist only in the mind. I don’t get upset when scientists say that ghosts exist in the mind.
